title.narrative: Social and Economic Empowerment for Slum-Dweller Youths in Freetown, Sierra Leone (SEESDY)

description.narrative:
Social and Economic Empowerment for Slum-Dweller Youths in Freetown, Sierra Leone (SEESDY). Cumulative: October, 2019 – March 2021 (Quarter 4 Year 2 inclusive).
Number of Beneficiaries:
October, 2019 – March 2021. 1) Oct, 2019 to June, 2020 (9-month Cumulative figure) = 397.
2) July to March 2021 (9-month Cumulative figure) = 420. Total =817. 3) January to March 2021 (3-month figure) = 90. Location: Palmoronkoh Slum Community, East of Freetown, Sierra Leone, West Africa.
1. Number of apprenticeship trainees: Male: 52, Female: 13, PWD: 7 (Female 6, Male 1), Total: 66.
1a. Apprenticeship Courses: - Tailoring: Male: 3, Female: 10, PWD: 5 (Male 1, Female 4) Total: 13. - Hair dressing: Female: 3, PWD: 2; Total: 3. - Electrical Installation: Male: 0, Total: 0. - Motor Mechanics: Male: 27, Total:27. - Welding: Male: 14, Total: 14. - Carpentry: Male: 2, Total 2. - Masonry: Male: 2, Total: 2. - Plumbing: Male: 4, Total: 4. - Electrical Installation: Male: 2, Total: 2.
2. Number of vocational trainees: Female: 81; PWD 5; Total: 81. 2a. Vocational Training courses: - Tailoring: Female: 33, Total: 33. PWD 2. - Catering: Female: 31, Total: 31 PWD 3. - Hair dressing: Female: 17, Total: 17.
3. Advocacy/lobbying; Rights/Gender; Empowerment: Male: 20, Female: 40, Total: 60.
4. Social empowerment in SGBV, Equity and Advocacy/lobbing: Male: 369, Female: 451, Total: 820. Covid-19 Rapid Response Project Sierra Leone. Cumulative: Sept, 2020 – December, 2020: 1. Number of Beneficiaries: 20,564. a) 3rd Sept.to 30th Sept, 2020 (1 month Cumulative figure) = 4,315. b) 1st.Oct.2020 to 31st. March,2021 (Five month cumulative = 16,249. Total = 20,564 (9,254 M, 11,310 F; PWD - 25M, 12F). 2. Number of people in the target 3 communities that are now aware of and can inform others about COVID 19 as a result of this project (Awareness Beneficiaries) = 1,884 (848 M/1,036 F). 3. Number that now know and can prevent preventive and inform others about Covid 19 preventive measures (Prevention Beneficiaries) = 6,444 (2,900 M/3,544 F). Number of vulnerable people that received water and food = 580 (261 M/319 F). 4. Number of Attendees at a Community talk show and jingle in the three communities of the project = 11,700 (5,265 Male/6,435 Female).
This financial data covers transactions carried out between 1st July and 30th September.

provider-org.narrative: Grant provided by DFID through UK Aid partnership grants to Transform Africa

receiver-org.narrative: Grant provided to Transform Africa for supporting downstream partner YDM in Sierra Leone.
